duties_responsibilities.duty: Test different products while adhering to internal standards and processes.
Work with project managers, implementation engineers, and developers to analyze requirements and functional specifications.
Perform test case development and be involved in planning and execution for system, regression, and integration testing.
Analyze and document test results, identify defects, and verify fixes.
Involved in test automation support and execution.
Maintain and track project artifacts necessary for Quality Assurance throughout the development life cycle.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, MIS, Computer Science, or a related field
